entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
